explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the performance of ESG equity indices in Latin America, comparing them to conventional benchmark indices using quantitative empirical methods such as Sharpe, Sortino, and Omega ratios, regression analysis, and Monte Carlo simulations. There is no mention of any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models in the title or abstract. The study is centered on financial analysis and portfolio diversification rather than any form of machine learning or related technologies.
